languages.text: {n}Ксенос небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Думаю, Караэль нашел способ получить доступ к моим шпионам, брошенным или оставленным в качестве спящих агентов на твоем корабле. Мое низвержение было слишком внезапным — я не успел подчистить следы".

{n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."
languages.original_text: {n}Ксенос небрежно пожимает плечами.{/n} "Думаю, Караэль нашел способ получить доступ к моим шпионам, брошенным или оставленным в качестве спящих агентов на твоем корабле. Мое низвержение было слишком внезапным — я не успел подчистить следы".

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael has found a way to gain access to my spies, left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to clean up my tracks."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael has found a way to gain access to my spies, left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to clean up my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Der Xenos zuckt gelassen mit den Schultern.{/n} "Kharael hat wohl einen Weg gefunden, Zugriff auf meine Spione zu bekommen. Die Spione, die als Schläfer auf Eurem Schiff belassen wurden — oder zurückgelassen. Mein Niedergang war so plötzlich, dass ich meine Spuren nicht verwischen konnte."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Xenos zuckt gelassen mit den Schultern.{/n} "Kharael hat wohl einen Weg gefunden, Zugriff auf meine Spione zu bekommen. Die Spione, die als Schläfer auf Eurem Schiff belassen wurden — oder zurückgelassen. Mein Niedergang war so plötzlich, dass ich meine Spuren nicht verwischen konnte."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋若无其事地耸了耸肩。{/n}“我觉得卡瑞尔应该是想办法联系到了我的特工，那些人一直潜伏在你的船上。我的倒台太突然了，根本来不及掩盖留下的痕迹。”
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋若无其事地耸了耸肩。{/n}“我觉得卡瑞尔应该是想办法联系到了我的特工，那些人一直潜伏在你的船上。我的倒台太突然了，根本来不及掩盖留下的痕迹。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Le xénos hausse les épaules avec nonchalance.{/n} « J'imagine que Kharael a réussi à contacter mes espions restés ou abandonnés comme agents dormants sur votre vaisseau. Ma chute a été si soudaine que je n'ai pas eu le temps d'effacer mes traces. »
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le xénos hausse les épaules avec nonchalance.{/n} « J'imagine que Kharael a réussi à contacter mes espions restés ou abandonnés comme agents dormants sur votre vaisseau. Ma chute a été si soudaine que je n'ai pas eu le temps d'effacer mes traces. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}El xenos se encoge de hombros despreocupadamente.{/n} «Imagino que Kharael encontró el modo de acceder a mis espías, los que quedaban y los agentes encubiertos abandonados en tu nave. Mi caída fue tan repentina que no pude borrar mis huellas».
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}El xenos se encoge de hombros despreocupadamente.{/n} «Imagino que Kharael encontró el modo de acceder a mis espías, los que quedaban y los agentes encubiertos abandonados en tu nave. Mi caída fue tan repentina que no pude borrar mis huellas».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}異種族は興味なさそうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「どうやらカラエルはお前の船で潜伏工作員として置き去りにされた俺のスパイと繋がる手段を見つけたらしい。失脚があまりに突然だったせいで、全ての痕跡を消す時間がなかったんだ」
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}異種族は興味なさそうに肩をすくめた。{/n}「どうやらカラエルはお前の船で潜伏工作員として置き去りにされた俺のスパイと繋がる手段を見つけたらしい。失脚があまりに突然だったせいで、全ての痕跡を消す時間がなかったんだ」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Zeno umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum Kharael, geminde kalmış ya da casus olarak bırakılmış ajanlarıma ulaşmanın bir yolunu bulmuş. Çöküşüm o kadar ani oldu ki arkamda bıraktığım izleri kapatmaya vaktim olmadı."
languages.original_text: {n}The xenos shrugs nonchalantly.{/n} "I think Kharael found a way to gain access to my spies, the ones left or abandoned as sleeper agents on your ship. My downfall was so sudden I never had the time to cover my tracks."

traits.locale_text: {n}Zeno umursamazca omuz silkiyor.{/n} "Sanıyorum Kharael geminde kalmış ya da casus olarak bırakılmış ajanlarıma ulaşmanın bir yolunu bulmuş. Çöküşüm o kadar ani oldu ki arkamda bıraktığım izleri kapatacak vaktim hiç olmadı."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
